svg.style: font-family: 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 18px; background-color: white; text-rendering: optimizeLegibility; -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;

text.tspan: Projected population by age cohort, Africa
Medium UN Population Division projections from 2015 through to 2100, differentiated by broad age cohort.
Source: OWID based on UN Population Statistics (2017)
